casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Terrance Javarr ROSS. No. 297PA15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Feb. 22, 2016. Peter Wood, Attorney at Law, for Ross, Terrance Javarr. Kathleen N. Bolton, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Mike Miller, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 22nd of February 2016 by State of NC:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 22nd of February 2016."

State of NC shall have up to and including the 14th day of March 2016 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
